DOC.brief_summary: The investigator retrospectively examine patient out-of-hospital resuscitation emergency medical Team ( EMT ) Kantonsspital Winterthur year 2013 one year follow-up structure interview Quality life . Furthermore , cost generate local health system analyse .
DOC.detailed_description: The Primary objective study evaluate Quality out-of-Hospital resuscitation ambulance Service Kantonsspital Winterthur include 1-year follow-up survivor . In follow-up evaluate Quality life validate questionnaire . The following endpoint retrospectively analyse : time-to-Response Interval ; Initial cardiac rhythm ; medication give ; number Defibrillations ; return spontaneous circulation , Overall cost local health System Furthermore length hospital-stay , survival Hospital discharge , one-year survival , Quality life one year resuscitation total cost analyse .
DOC.criteria: Patients outofhospital resuscitation Winterthur year 2013 treatment emergency medical team Kantonsspital Winterthur Written inform consent patient structure interview Patients resuscitation death Scene write informed consent patient structure interview
